description: Explore how GitHub Sponsors supports open-source projects by providing a platform for developers and companies to financially back open-source initiatives. Learn about the program's mechanisms, benefits, challenges, and best practices for sustainable open-source development.
keywords: GitHub Sponsors, open source, financial backing, developers, sponsorship, open-source projects, GitHub, sustainability, innovation, community, best practices
title: Exploring GitHub Sponsors: Supporting Open Source Sustainably
